The Story Behind Scandal By Night

Launched in 2018 as a darker, more intense flanker to the original Scandal, this fragrance embodies the spirit of Parisian nights. Jean Paul Gaultier created this scent for the woman who lives life on her own terms, embracing both power and femininity. The distinctive leg-shaped bottle symbolizes this duality â€“ strength and sensuality combined in one irresistible package. ðŸ”¥

Frequently Asked Question

How does Scandal By Night differ from the original Scandal?

Scandal By Night is significantly more intense and seductive than the original. While both share honey as a key note, Scandal By Night amplifies the oriental aspects with deeper patchouli, tonka bean, and tuberose notes. The original Scandal leans more fresh and fruity, while Scandal By Night embraces a richer, more nocturnal character with enhanced projection and longevity â€“ perfect for evening wear and special occasions. âœ¨
